dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 2672 : To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 520 Carter Street in Fairview, Illinois, as the “Sgt. Douglas J. Riney Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 520 Carter Street in Fairview, Illinois, as the Sgt. Douglas J. Riney Post Office.

section.header: Sgt. Douglas J. Riney Post Office

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 520 Carter Street in Fairview, Illinois, shall be known and designated as the Sgt. Douglas J. Riney Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Sgt. Douglas J. Riney Post Office.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives November 15, 2017.
